td.content: s:a 45 yr old white M coachman presents with 2 years history of Body Aches. o:Height 72 in, Weight 234 lbs, Temperature 99.3 F, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 18 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed cefuroxime axetil - 500 mg 2x day, and ordered B. burgdorferi Ab in CSF.

s:M coachman aged 45 ys with Body Aches. he has had several such episodes over past 3 years. denies any smoking denies any alcohol use o:Height 70 in, Weight 224 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 15 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to rheumatology.
